output.title: output
output.description:
Data is a list of OrderItems and their corresponding time-slot availabilities to be used to book. 
For each BookingAvailability, Show Order Item Name then render as a table: [dateValue (format as Jul 1, 2025), startTime - endTime ( include locationTimezone), bookableLocationName], appending "And many more..." if moreSlotsFound is true for the BookingAvailability.
You MUST show the correct date, time and location for each timeSlots.
If moreSlotsFound is true for any BookingAvailability, inform user "Many slots foundâ€”suggest selecting a specific location to narrow?" and prompt for a Bookable Location, and/or choose a smaller time range or as a fallback ask the user to only book in a few orderItems at a time.
If empty, suggest extending dates or alternative locations.
